com.example.a1

Class Task

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.a1.Task

  • public class Task
extends java.lang.Object
    A representation of a task. A tasks consists of a title, requester's username, description, status, and bids. A tasks can also have photographs and a location added to it.
    See Also:
    User, Status

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Task(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String username, java.lang.String description)
      Constructs a Task object with status REQUESTED, no bids, and no photographs.

      Constructs a Task object.
